GBMutils 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Run bootstrap correlation analysis

    run_bootstrap_corr.Rd

    Run bootstrap correlation analysis

    run_bootstrap_corr(
  pair,
  df,
  stat_func = compute_corr,
  n_iter = 500,
  method = "pearson",
  ncpus = 1
)

    Arguments

    pair

    named vector of length 2 (names: Var1 and Var2) with columns to select for analysis

    df

    dataframe

    stat_func

    function to use for computation of statistic, i.e. correlation

    n_iter

    number of iterations to use for bootstrapping

    method

    method to use for computing correlation

    Contents

    Developed by Joan Kant.
